modShortDescription: This adds an option to the menu for Land Claim Count with options '1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 10, 20, 25, 50, 100, 150, 200' as Land Claim Block Count choices on the Multiplayer Tab with the rest of the Land Claim options.
modDescription:
This adds an option to the [menu](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-menu/) for Land Claim Count with options ‘1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 10, 20, 25, 50, 100, 150, 200’ as Land Claim Block Count choices on the Multiplayer Tab with the rest of the Land Claim options.

These options are also added as available filter choices in the server browser.

## Changelog

Fixed Land Claim Count display after search has completed & selecting server.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/RELXIX-7DTD/A20_XML_Modlets/tree/main/RELXIX_UIMENU_AddLandClaimCountOption)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25785-relxix-a20-xml-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Red Eagle LXIX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/red-eagle-lxix/)
